transfer_event.semantic: The transfer event is used when a cultural asset has been transferred from one place to another or has changed ownership without being explicitly confiscated, acquired or restituted.

extent.description: Text passage that most expressively describes this particular event.

date.description: Date of the transfer - if no unique assignment to departure_date or arrival_date is possible.

departure_date.description: Date on which the cultural asset was departured from the original location.

arrival_date.description: Date on which the cultural asset arrived at the new location.

physical_description.description: Description of the physical state, appearance or content - if no unique assignment to physical_description_before or physical_description_after is possible.

physical_description_before.description: Description of the physical state, appearance or content before the transfer.

physical_description_after.description: Description of the physical state, appearance or content after the transfer.

to_location.description: Name of location to which the cultural asset was transferred.

from_location.description: Name of location from which the cultural asset was transferred.

by_legal_entity.description: Name of legal entity, who transferred the cultural asset.

identified_by.description: Name of legal entity, who identified the cultural asset at destination.

possessor_before.description: Name of legal entity, who possessed the cultural asset before the transfer.

possessor_after.description: Name of legal entity, who possessed the cultural asset after the transfer.

deposit_event.semantic: The deposit event is used when a cultural asset has been deposited at a specific location or discovered at a certain place or in certain ownership. This often happened before or after transfer events.

extent.description: Text passage that most expressively describes this particular event.

physical_description.description: Description of the physical state, appearance or content when deposited.

at_location.description: Name of location at which the cultural asset was deposited.

possessor.description: Name of legal entity, who possessed the cultural asset when deposited.

deposited_by.description: Name of legal entity, who deposited the cultural asset.

depot_number.description: Number of the depot, at which the cultural asset was deposited.

collected_in.description: Name of collection, the cultural asset was part of when deposited.

confiscation_event.semantic: The confiscation event is used, when the cultural asset was confiscated by a legal entity. This means that the cutltural asset was taken from its previous owner without consent. In context of the second world war, this mostly happened, when a cultural asset was transferred to Germany from other countries.

extent.description: Text passage that most expressively describes this particular event.

physical_description.description: Description of the physical state, appearance or content when confiscated.

at_location.description: Name of location at which the cultural asset was confiscated.

from_legal_entity.description: Name of legal entity, from whom the cultural asset was confiscated.

from_collection.description: Name of collection, the cultural asset was confiscated from.

by_legal_entity.description: Name of legal entity, who confiscated the cultural asset.

to_collection.description: Name of collection, the cultural asset was part of after confiscation.

acquisition_event.semantic: The acquisition event is used, when the cultural asset was acquired by a legal entity for some kind of compensation and changed ownership.

extent.description: Text passage that most expressively describes this particular event.

physical_description.description: Description of the physical state, appearance or content when acquired.

at_location.description: Name of location at which the cultural asset was acquired.

from_legal_entity.description: Name of legal entity, from whom the cultural asset was acquired.

from_collection.description: Name of collection, the cultural asset was part of before acquisition.

by_legal_entity.description: Name of legal entity, who acquired the cultural asset.

to_collection.description: Name of collection, the cultural asset was part of after acquisition.

through_legal_entity.description: Name of legal entity, who acted as an intermediary in the acquisition.

restitution_event.semantic: The restitution event is used, when the cultural asset was restituted to a legal entity, who was the rightful owner of the cultural asset.

extent.description: Text passage that most expressively describes this particular event.

date.description: Date of the transfer - if no unique assignment to departure_date or arrival_date is possible.

departure_date.description: Date on which the cultural asset was departured from the original location.

arrival_date.description: Date on which the cultural asset arrived at the new location.

physical_description.description: Description of the physical state, appearance or content - if no unique assignment to physical_description_before or physical_description_after is possible.

physical_description_before.description: Description of the physical state, appearance or content before the restitution.

physical_description_after.description: Description of the physical state, appearance or content after the restitution.

to_location.description: Name of location to which the cultural asset was restituted.

from_location.description: Name of location from which the cultural asset was restituted.

by_legal_entity.description: Name of legal entity, who transferred the cultural asset.

possessor_before.description: Name of legal entity, who possessed the cultural asset before the restitution.

possessor_after.description: Name of legal entity, who possessed the cultural asset after the restitution.
